title: Bruce Houston
text:
Bruce Houston (born 26 August 1999) is an Irish <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> and <a href="European%20Rugby%20Champions%20Cup">European Rugby Champions Cup</a> side <a href="Ulster%20Rugby">Ulster</a>. He plays as a <a href="Fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>.
Ulster.
Houston made his senior competitive debut for <a href="Ulster%20Rugby">Ulster</a> in their 40–7 defeat against provincial rivals <a href="Leinster%20Rugby">Leinster</a> in round 13 of the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Pro14">2018–19 Pro14</a> on 5 January 2019. Houston replaced <a href="Angus%20Kernohan">Angus Kernohan</a> after 48 minutes.
